name: DEMO(LISH)
description:
Demolish the randomly generated block world.

Aim your shot by moving the platform with WASD. Charge your shot by holding down the left click on your mouse.

Use jumps (space bar) and boosts (left click) after firing to redirect your ball.

Change your camera style by right clicking during your aiming phase or the post-aiming phase.

Each color block has a unique affect - try to identify them all.

Don't fall (or you die).

PS: Hit R to reset the game or Esc to quit

Song used is "Castle of Fear" by David Renda
